item.description: Each Republican in the House has repeatedly voted an election denier for Speaker, even on the anniversary of an attempted coup d'Ã©tat whose erstwhile leader is whipping the last few votes tonight. The gradations of sedition do not excuse the best of them as a "moderate." #USPolitics
